application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 3 (Demolition and Construction Management Plan) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the construction works of the approved development (P/2785/20) would not unduly impact on highway safety and the amenities of the existing occupiers of the properties adjacent to the site, contrary to policy T7(G) of The London Plan (2021) and policies DM1 and DM43 of The Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Reason : 2 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to to condition 4 (Biodiversity) to demonstrate to the Local Planning Authority that the approved development (P/2785/20) would make appropriate provision for the protection of biodiversity. The proposal is therefore contrary to The National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policy G7 of The London Plan (2021), policy CS1.E of The Harrow Core Strategy 2012 and policies DM1.B(e) and policy DM20.B of The Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Reason : 3 - The proposed cross-section for the hard surfacing (condition 5) is unacceptable and therefore it has not been demonstrated to the satisfaction of The Local Planning Authority that the proposal would not result in localised flooding, contrary to The National Planning Policy Framework (2021), SI13 of The London Plan (2021), CS1.W of The Core Strategy (2012) and policy DM10 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 4 - Insufficient information has been submitted to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority with regards to the proposed boundary treatment (condition 5). Therefore, it has not been demonstrated to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposal would comply  with the high quality design aspirations of The National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policy D6 of The London Plan 2021, policies CS1.B of The Harrow Core Strategy 2012 and policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.
description: Details pursuant to Conditions 3 (Demolition & Construction Logistics Plan), 4 (Bio-diversity) and 5 (Materials) attached to planning permission P/2785/20 dated 9/7/20 for Creation of third floor comprising of eight flats (8 X 2 bed); parking; bin and cycle stores
